title: MMO Game - Club Galactik Football
tasks: In charge of researching and defining the initial modular architecture
Co-responsible for the production of the 2D UIs
projectDescription: The project was made by VirtualFairground
It was a massive multi-player online game running on top of the famous away3D library
The game was highly customizable and contained 4 races of avatar
The game was internationally played and was available in 6 languages
There was a parental control system allowing a restricted / controlled access for children below 13 years old
team: I participated in developing this game together with 14 excellent programmers (AS3, Java and C++) and a dozen of talented visual and 3D artists
